meanings.definition: In a way that involves competition.
meanings.sent1: She ran competitively in the race, trying to beat the other runners.
meanings.sent2: The two friends played tennis competitively, each trying to win the match.
meanings.sent3: The siblings competed competitively for the last slice of pizza.
meanings.sent4: The students worked competitively to finish the project before the deadline.
meanings.sent5: The athletes trained competitively, pushing themselves to improve their skills.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is competitive.
meanings.sent1: He played soccer competitively, always giving his best effort on the field.
meanings.sent2: The company operates competitively in the market, striving to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: The dogs raced competitively to see who could fetch the ball first.
meanings.sent4: The students answered the quiz questions competitively, eager to show their knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The siblings competed competitively in the board game, trying to outsmart each other.
